thread.title: BRIEF-Great Southern Bancorp Inc says On April 18, Co Approved New Common Stock Repurchase Plan

title: BRIEF-Great Southern Bancorp Inc says On April 18, Co Approved New Common Stock Repurchase Plan

organizations.name: co approved new common stock repurchase plan reuters

text:
April 19, 2018 / 6:43 PM / Updated 15 minutes ago BRIEF-Great Southern Bancorp Inc says On April 18, Co Approved New Common Stock Repurchase Plan Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - Great Southern Bancorp Inc: 
* GREAT SOUTHERN BANCORP INC - ON APRIL 18, 2018, CO APPROVED A NEW COMMON STOCK REPURCHASE PLAN - SEC FILING 
* GREAT SOUTHERN BANCORP - PLAN AUTHORIZES REPURCHASE OF UP TO 500,000 SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK, REPRESENTING ABOUT 3.5% OF OUTSTANDING SHARES 
* GREAT SOUTHERN BANCORP INC - NEW PLAN REPLACES AND TERMINATES CO'S REPURCHASE PLAN THAT WAS APPROVED NOVEMBER 15, 2006 Source text - bit.ly/2HOqhgs Further company coverage: (Reporting by Deepak Devalapur)
